SwingPlotter

Instructions

  • Drag sliders to set popular votes at center of plot. Press "Plot Swings" to plot.
  • X-axis: Liberal-NDP swing from -30% to +30%.
  • Y-axis: Liberal-Conservative swing from -30% to +30%.
  • Colours indicate the winning party, lighter colours indicate minority parliament.
  • Seats are predicted using the uniform swing model based on 2015 federal election.
